original_title: Les Nouvelles Geishas des buveurs solitaires
overview: Kyabakura is a type of hostess club in Japan, inspired by French cabaret. There exists an ambiguous relationship between the clients, the men, and the hostesses, that should never materialize into a sexual relationship...There are strict rules, which of course, are designed to be broken.
title: I Don't Want to Sleep with You I Just Want to Make You Hard
